_header: Two men came riding over Hackney Hay
_description: A prophecy on the fall of Reeves Abbey — two couplets

BLCottTitDXII.Transcription:
Twoe men came riding ouer Hackney hayThe one of a blacke horse
                    þe other on a grayThe one vnto the other did sayLoe yonder stood
                    Reues that faire Abbay
BLCottTitDXII.Editions:
Wright,  Thomas,  and  James Orchard Halliwell-Phillipps, eds.  
             Reliquiae Antiquae.
         2 vols. London: Smith, 1845: 1.205.
